*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Samuel M. Williams, Bexar, December 28, 1830. Political news. Difficulty of avoiding paity entanglements. Certificates for admission oí colonists according to law of April 6, 1830*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*[From Williams Papers, Rosenberg Library, Galveston, Tex.]*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*Bexar */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="12-28-1830">28 December 1830*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dr *person_mentioned*Sam*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*I arrived here *date_mentioned n="12-27-1830">last morning*/date_mentioned*, and shall leave the *date_mentioned n="12-30-1830">day after tomorrow*/date_mentioned* by the *location_mentioned*upper road*/location_mentioned*. I get an *person_mentioned*escort */person_mentioned*from here as far as *location_mentioned*Rio Grande*/location_mentioned*, and another from there to *location_mentioned*Saltillo*/location_mentioned*— *person_mentioned*Madero */person_mentioned*will leave in a few days for that place. I wish you to pay him all the attention you can. Shew him some of the deeds that are finished and explain the mode of translating the *person_mentioned*Surveyors */person_mentioned*return etc—also the general plots, he is (I have no doubt) as true and warm a *person_mentioned*friend */person_mentioned*as the *person_mentioned*North Americans*/person_mentioned* have— he is a devoted *person_mentioned*friend of Guerrero */person_mentioned*and opposed to *person_mentioned*Teran */person_mentioned*and the *person_mentioned*present administration*/person_mentioned*— on subjects of this kind it is best to be silent unless directly questioned, in the latter case you will of course give prudent answers.*/p*
*p*The people of this place are, in heart, unanimously hostile to the *person_mentioned*present administration*/person_mentioned*, and they are more friendly to the *person_mentioned*North American*/person_mentioned* emigration than they ever were. The state of affairs in *location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned*is, if any thing, more unsettled than ever. *person_mentioned*Teran */person_mentioned*I believe will not go to *location_mentioned*Mexico*/location_mentioned*, and I think it not improbable that he may turn his course this way— from what I can learn both *person_mentioned*Piedrass*/person_mentioned* and the *person_mentioned*General */person_mentioned*are desirous to have a good standing with the *person_mentioned*settlers*/person_mentioned*— we ought to encourage this idea for we may derive much benefit from it, at least so far as to keep off harsh orders etc.*/p*
*p*I send you two hundred signatures, have certificates printed over them verbatim like the others and fill them up, all except the name— give as many to *person_mentioned*R. Williamson*/person_mentioned* as he wants and send some to *person_mentioned*McGuffin */person_mentioned*and some to *person_mentioned*Piedrass*/person_mentioned*, and some to *person_mentioned*Col Thorn.*/person_mentioned* Try and have them printed at night when no one is present and take care that none of the blanks get into other hands, let none know anything of this but *person_mentioned*Lesassier */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Williamson*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Settlers */person_mentioned*can get in with certificates from *person_mentioned*De Witt*/person_mentioned* and he ought to have about 200 struck off and sent to *location_mentioned*Arkansas */location_mentioned*and *location_mentioned*Natchitoches */location_mentioned*etc.*/p*
*p*I presume you have heard all the news from *person_mentioned*Pettus */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Johnson*/person_mentioned*, in this place there is Novedad de *person_mentioned*indios */person_mentioned*[rumor of Indians] every hour—a large *person_mentioned*party */person_mentioned*were discovered *date_mentioned n="12-27-1830">yesterday */date_mentioned*on *location_mentioned*Medina near the road.*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Arciniega */person_mentioned*will be on by the*date_mentioned n="01-15-1831"> 15 of next mon*/date_mentioned*to try and get the *location_mentioned*coast colony */location_mentioned*out of the way by that time. I will write another letter by him and one by *person_mentioned*Madero */person_mentioned*both of a public character, that is you can shew them if you think proper, but this one no person must see except *person_mentioned*Lesassier*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*There can scarcely be a more difficult thing than to play a double game, it is dangerous, and it is at times, a nice point to draw the distinction between such a game and dishonor— we are so situated that we must keep a good understanding with *person_mentioned*Teran */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Alaman*/person_mentioned*,— but at the same time all our *person_mentioned*best friends*/person_mentioned* at *location_mentioned*Saltillo */location_mentioned*and in *location_mentioned*Mexico*/location_mentioned* are very hostile to both those men. Silence, prudence, and vigilance, must all be called in requisition. I shall have a dreadful task at *location_mentioned*Saltillo*/location_mentioned*—if I am compelled to come out and take sides openly, I must go with the *person_mentioned*Viescas */person_mentioned*of course, in this event the whole pack with *person_mentioned*Licenciado Aguirre*/person_mentioned* at the head will open against me. Tho, it is best not to anticipate trouble, in two weeks after I get there you shall hear what the prospect is. *person_mentioned*Viesca */person_mentioned*has returned to the Govt.—this is a good sign. Say nothing for, nor against *person_mentioned*Zavala*/person_mentioned*, very rigid orders have been issued by *person_mentioned*Teran */person_mentioned*prohibiting the admission of *person_mentioned*Zavalas families*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Keep peace and union at *location_mentioned*home*/location_mentioned*, I shall not idle *location_mentioned*abroad*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*I have written to *person_mentioned*De Witt*/person_mentioned* to get 200 certificates of the same kind of mine printed and signed by him and sent in blank to different places. Aid the *person_mentioned*poor fellow*/person_mentioned* along with it. *person_mentioned*Chambers */person_mentioned*has not yet arrived. I cannot concieve what detains him. *person_mentioned*Pettus */person_mentioned*and myself parted in such terms as I wish to be with all the *person_mentioned*settlers*/person_mentioned*—I have confidence in him now, and I think he has in me. The *person_mentioned*chiefs */person_mentioned*answer to *person_mentioned*Williamson */person_mentioned*will inform you what has been done in his business— A consulta with the *person_mentioned*Superioridad */person_mentioned*and nothing can be done until an answer is obtained*/p*
*p*Attend to the writing of the certificates (do) take care of my signatures, don't put m[e] in the power of the *person_mentioned*printer */person_mentioned*or his *person_mentioned*boys*/person_mentioned*. I have written to [name illegible] on this subject*/p*
*p*remember me to *person_mentioned*Mrs. Sweet*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Sarah*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*[Addressed:]*person_mentioned* S. M. Williams*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Austin*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
